resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of the Management Group structure
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').managementGroups]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Definitions at the root Management Group
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').policyDefinitions]

resources.comments: Move the Subscription to the appropriate Management Group or skip if not used. (Platform Subscription)
resources.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('subscriptionId'))), variables('moveSubscription'), variables('noSubscription'))]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of a Log Analytics Workspace and Automation account in the Platform Management Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').monitoring]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Log Analytics Solutions in the Platform Subscription
resources.condition: [and(not(empty(parameters('subscriptionId'))), or(or(or(or(or(equals(parameters('enableSecuritySolution'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableAgentHealth'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableChangeTracking'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableUpdateMgmt'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableActivityLog'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableAntiMalware'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableVmInsights'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableServiceMap'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableSqlAssessment'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableKeyVaultAnalytics'), 'Yes')))]
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').monitoringSolutions]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of a Recovery Services Vault for the Platform Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').recoveryServicesVault]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of an Azure Storage account in the Platform Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').storage]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Azure Policy Assignments for Landing Zone Subscriptions
resources.condition: [or(or(or(or(or(equals(parameters('denySubnetWithoutNsg'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyRdp'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyIpForwarding'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableSqlEncryption'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableSqlAudit'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('enableStorageHttps'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('enableAksPolicy'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('denyAksPrivileged'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyAksPrivilegedEscalation'), 'Yes')), equals(parameters('denyHttpIngressForAks'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denySsh'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyPrivateDnsZones'), 'Yes'), equals(parameters('denyPip'), 'Yes'))]
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').landingZone]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Diagnostics and Security controls for the Platform Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').diagnosticsAndSecurity]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Network Connectivity resources in the Platform Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').connectivity]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of Private DNS resources in the Platform Subscription
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').privateDns]

resources.comments: Linked template for the creation of the GitHub Repo for storing the current state of the Azure environment
resources.name: [variables('deploymentNames').azOps]

deployment.value: [concat(deployment().name, ' has successfully deployed. Welcome to Azure Foundations!')]
